sentences.en: Once you've had your breakfast, you can either do one of two things.
sentences.zh: 早餐后，你有以下两种活动可以选择。
sentences.phonetic_us: /wʌns juv hæd jʊr ˈbrɛkfəst, ju kæn ˈiðər du wʌn əv tu θɪŋz/

sentences.en: If you like surfing, then we recommend you jump on down to Berawa Beach and try out some surf lessons and enjoy the weather and the beach there.
sentences.zh: 如果你喜欢冲浪，我们推荐你直奔Berawa海滩，体验冲浪课程，享受那里的阳光和海滩。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɪf ju laɪk ˈsɜrfɪŋ, ðɛn wi ˌrɛkəˈmɛnd ju dʒʌmp ɑn daʊn tə bəˈrɑwə biʧ ænd traɪ aʊt sʌm sɜrf ˈlɛsənz ænd ɪnˈdʒɔɪ ðə ˈwɛðər ænd ðə biʧ ðɛr/

sentences.en: Alternatively, if you don't like surfing, you can wander around and go shopping.
sentences.zh: 相反地，如果你不喜欢冲浪，也可以四处逛逛，去购物。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɔlˈtɜrnətɪvli, ɪf ju doʊnt laɪk ˈsɜrfɪŋ, ju kæn ˈwɑndər əˈraʊnd ænd ɡoʊ ˈʃɑpɪŋ/

sentences.en: There are so many cool shops all around Canggu and Pererinan.
sentences.zh: Canggu和Pererinan周边有很多超酷的店铺。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ðɛr ɑr soʊ ˈmɛni kul ʃɑps ɔl əˈraʊnd ˈkæŋɡu ænd pɛrəˈrinən/

sentences.en: After you shop till you're dropped, you're gonna need a little bit of a beverage, so we would head to La Brisa, which is a really really cool beach club that overlooks the water.
sentences.zh: 等你逛到虚脱，肯定得来点饮料，所以我们会去La Brisa，这是一个非常酷的海滩俱乐部，俯瞰大海。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ˈæftər ju ʃɑp tɪl jʊr drɑpt, jʊr ˈɡɑnə nid ə ˈlɪtəl bɪt əv ə ˈbɛvərɪdʒ, soʊ wi wʊd hɛd tə lɑ ˈbrisə, wɪʧ ɪz ə ˈrɪli ˈrɪli kul biʧ klʌb ðæt ˌoʊvərˈlʊks ðə ˈwɔtər/

sentences.en: Really nice for sunset vibes and an afternoon cocktail.
sentences.zh: 那边的日落氛围真的很棒，很适合在下午的时候喝杯鸡尾酒。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ˈrɪli naɪs fɔr ˈsʌnˌsɛt vaɪbz ænd ən ˌæftərˈnun ˈkɑkˌteɪl/

sentences.en: Also, if you're there on a Sunday, they do have a really cool Sunday market and that is definitely one to check out.
sentences.zh: 另外，如果你碰巧周日在那儿，千万别错过他们超棒的周日集市，绝对值得去看看。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ˈɔlsoʊ, ɪf jʊr ðɛr ɑn ə ˈsʌndeɪ, ðeɪ du hæv ə ˈrɪli kul ˈsʌndeɪ ˈmɑrkɪt ænd ðæt ɪz ˈdɛfənɪtli wʌn tə tʃɛk aʊt/
